heading.title: training
body: We provide customer-specific training which ensures that those delegates attending our courses are trained according to the systems they work on. Please contact us should you wish to find out more about any of our proudly offered courses

courses.name: PLC Basic
courses.description: This 3 day course gives a basic introduction into the concepts behind PLC theory
objectives: What the PLC is and what it is used for

courses.name: PLC Advanced
courses.description: This 3 day course gives advanced practical programming training of PLCs
objectives: The standard Stop/Start circuit with interlocks

courses.name: Drive Basic
courses.description: This 1 day course gives advanced insight into the parameters of Variable Frequency Drives
objectives: Recap of principals of AC drives

courses.name: Troubleshooting
courses.description: This 1 day course gives a Basic Introduction to Fault Finding
objectives: The standard stop/start circuit with interlocks

courses.name: Automation Control Systems 1
courses.description: This 1 day course gives a basic introduction to Control Systems
